plot: Mac and Dennis pursue the ultimate high of hunting another man by stalking Rickety Cricket, while Dee and Charlie become obsessed with eating human flesh after they come to believe Frank has fed some of it to them.

Charlie and Dee get a taste for human flesh when they discover Frank's hidden stash of meat. Meanwhile, Mac and Dennis, inspired by the movie "Rambo: First Blood" decide to stage a manhunt against their former high school rival Rickety Cricket.—halo1k
